2 Maternal and Perinatal Health Outcomes
Decrease in Maternal Mortality in Facilities:  
In both countries, the maternal mortality 
ratio (MMR) in all facilities declined by 
35%, from 534 maternal deaths per 100,000 
live births at baseline to 345 per 100,000 
at endline in Uganda and from 310 to 202 
maternal deaths per 100,000 in Zambia. The 
MMR in EmONC facilities declined by 24% 
in Ug
